text:
DOH COVID-19 CASE BULLETIN #044

As of 4PM today, April 27, 2020, the DOH reports 198 new cases (PH7580-PH7777) of COVID-19. The total number of cases in the country is now at 7,777.

DOH also announces 70 new recoveries. This brings the total number of recoveries to 932. https://t.co/vU5oCnb7r4
